text: @BBCWorld It is slightly insensitive, but that's not surprising from Mr Donald Trump, but hopefully China has learnt some lessons from this virus, and will regulate to stop live animal markets with pigs chickens and bats mixing with humans 🤔✌️ #ChineseVirus  #coronavirus #Convid19 .
